website_summaries.verdict: It's not as feature-laden as higher-end models, but the Cyber-shot W120 offers plenty of style and substance for the price.
cons: misses many on-board editing options other models have

customer_reviews.title: used camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used camera as a gift. I owned this same camera and wanted another Sony that had the easy to use dial system that is no longer found on cameras. The camera came with all the original packaging. The recipient of the gift has to take pictures of student art work i at the spur of the moment and finds this camera works really well. Was also shipped very promptly.
customer_reviews.author: good cookie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I already had a sony cybershot and took great pictures. As it became older, the lenses would not open or close. I decided to purchase another camera. Due to the great quality pictures I had taken with my old sony, I decided to purchase a new cybershot and found this product to be a good value for its quality. I do feel that the batteries are very expensive in comparison to my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had one prior to this, but it was dropped and couldn't be repaired. I love it because it has an actual viewfinder, which doesn't exist on any of the newer models, or any comparative cameras from other companies today. The quality of the pictures is terrific. I will never understand the current need for more and more megapixels on a camera. The camera arrived in better condition than I expected. Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lady M

customer_reviews.title: I knew what I wanted and this works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this camera for 6 years and I haven't had a single problem with it yet. I did my research and knew what I was looking for. This works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Face in the Mirror

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pocket Camera
customer_reviews.text: We have had several of this model camera and all have performed well. However, the newer Sony models do not have a viewfinder which means that photographers can't see in bright light. It seems that after this camera, we will need to purchase a Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Foote

customer_reviews.title: It's kinda ok
customer_reviews.text: It works sort of, but if I had it to do over would opt for something else. Some times the pictures turn out pretty good & other times not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for a family member who already had this same camera. She has used it for years and would never want to be without it. Although she has no problems with the one she owned, we bought it as a backup. She can also use the same cords, etc. and not have to replace them. She never leaves home without her camera and is a real camera bug.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bazan

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it a year ago and its working perfect. A little slow in between taking pictures other than that i have not seen any negatives to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vibin Koshy

customer_reviews.title: Ten Year Old Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Just about every feature has been tried and no complaints were heard. She takes it every where. Cameras can be purchased for less dollars but the extra features make it an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Came with the media card CASE, but no media card. I can only take 5 pics without one :/
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera - no regrets
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this camera, especially for what I paid for it. The pics are clear and I love the sleekness of it and its relatively small size.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC W120
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price. I feel the only drawback, it doesn't take AA rechargable batteries. It is a separate battery pack. Other than that, a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot Review
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and it was a great value to purchase. There are a ton of preset picture-taking settings which makes it easy to shoot great pictures for any non-photographer. It is also very easy to upload the pictures to your computer or TV.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C. I.

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the pictures taken in a low-light and additional features of the camera like "smile shutter", high ISO sensitivity, etc. Good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rulixx

customer_reviews.title: For $109 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Pixel is dead on display upon arrival. Great little camera for cheap, so not a big deal if I lose or break it. Sony is still stupid for using proprietary memory cards
customer_reviews.author: B. Schick

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely pleased and excited to have purchased this camera, the Sonyt Cybershot 120. The transaction was great. It arrived right on schedule in excellent condition, as promised. I am really enjoying it and feel that I made a good choice, after a lot of research.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered as promised. The camera is compact which is exactly what we wanted. Just don't forget to buy yourself a memory card like i did :P
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Bresnen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the features I wanted: easy to use, long battery life, and it's not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Chen

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sony cybershot camera. I took so many beautiful pictures on my cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Liguori

customer_reviews.title: Second time same issues
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the product is OK. I bought the camera once prior to this (not from Amazon) and it lasted about a year each time. I would be hesitant to recommend this camera to a friend. It did work really well for a few months, but if you are looking for long term, I would look into other options.
customer_reviews.author: UncleDubs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of the photos that I can take with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good for the value.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $109, and based on that price, this camera is a wonderful bargain. At the MSRP price of $179, I'd much rather go with a Canon for a few dollars more. Pros: Small size (perfect for pocket), huge display, solid construction. Face & Smile recognition is a FANTASTIC feature, and steadyshot is a blessing for my wife. cons: Small buttons, deleting pictures is a multi-step process involving menus, 4GB Sony memory cards is 5X the price of 4GB SD cards. All the steadyshot & smile features drain the battery VERY fast.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marble

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality of pictures
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera after upgrading from a Kodak Easyshare 4.0 (which I loved) and I am so disapointed with the quality of pictures. It only takes nice pictures if you outside or in a very well lit area. Also, if your subject even moves the slightest bit, the pictures are blurry. I am really disapointed with the colors in the pictures. I had to set it to vivid color just to capture some brighter pictures. The colors are very dull and washed out. My Kodak Easyshare camera took way better pictures than this. I am very dispointed in this Sony product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Haymes

customer_reviews.title: the truth about the w120
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera got mine on ebay I like sony the w120 is so nice i have a w510 and the w120 is so much better i have ben doing photography for years and i can say this is one of my favorite cameras i have own pic quality 9_10 Focus 10_10 if i used this camera for a week i would swear it was a 400$ camera i got mine for 30$ used like new
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this just before a trip to Utah. Very compact, easy to use. A 4G memory stick holds about 1500 pictures. The OEM battery lasted a week and 600 pictures. Can't beat it. Also got one of those "gumby" mini tripods at Wal Mart for $10. It's about 8" long with flexible legs. Highly recommended as well.
customer_reviews.author: AbbyKay

customer_reviews.title: Why the price jump?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a christmas gift and my cousin loves it. I guess I should have bought myself one hack then as well. Back then, it was only $109-119. Why has the price DOUBLED??!?!?? performance of the camera = ***** price of the camera = *
customer_reviews.author: S. Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: Thus far the CyberShot has been a great purchase. We bought it for our daughter for Christmas, and we love it's ease of use right out of the box, the various functions it offers, and the high quality photos and videos. We were disappointed with the lack of a memory storage card (had to buy one separately after the fact), and you also have to beware of shutter lag with point and shoot digital cameras, such as this CyberShot. Other than that, as mentioned, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Mailman

customer_reviews.title: Sony cybershot
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this camera; it has a big screen on the back,very compact, and takes great pics at night. Love the fact that it doesn't use batteries too
customer_reviews.author: movie buff

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber Shot 4X is great!  2nd time I've reviewed this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second email request for a review that I have answered. The camera is great and the order and shipping were flawless. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jgat

customer_reviews.title: nice but buy a memory card
customer_reviews.text: This is nice camera. Small and takes good pictures. Just BEWARE if you don't have a memory card this camera only holds 5 pictures on the internal memory!! I picked this camera up kind of in a rush and thought I would have room on the inter. memory for 20-30 pictures, thought wrong. Other than that it is a nice camera, good enough until I get my DSLR! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Beachmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my Mom for Christmas and she loves it. She is new to digital photography and has difficulty with new electronic gadgets sometimes. She has no trouble taking beautiful pictures with this camera. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a small but high quality point and shoot digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best budget Camera with HD support
customer_reviews.text: I never expected those many features that this camera provides at such a nominal price. Its so easy to setup and I have connected the same to an HDTV with very ease. Also its 4x zoom is plus as some of the other cameras within the same price range hardly comes at 3x optical zoom. Go for it , first for its price , then its features and last but not the least, its SONY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Satish Uppada

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We got the camera in 2 days from J&R, and we like it! It does what we want: it takes good pictures. Plus, it looks good. It has a lot of features that we haven't used yet, but that's one thing that's good about it. If we want to learn more, we can. But we don't have to know much to point, shoot, and transfer to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best little and cheap digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Excelent pictures. Multiple face detection. Smile detection (fantastic). Good resolution on movies. Powerful flash. 4x3 and 16x9 pictures. Full HD 1080 prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Joao A Kouyoumdjian

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Good product, not the best in cameras but excellent for a 10 years old girl. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very quality product. Takes great pictures. Has lots of setting for personal adjustments. The smile shutter is a fun tool. And I have even dropped it once and it held up great. Not even a scratch. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my sister and she is very happy with all the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida

customer_reviews.title: affordable
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for only $138.51, it's a good price deal. the digicam is nice. it has everything that i wanted. have one!
customer_reviews.author: edmenz

customer_reviews.title: the worst camera in the whole world
customer_reviews.text: the machine looks good, pictures are not bad, but if you are lucky it will works for 6 or maximum 12 months. They are so bad constructed in china they are so delicate. Never buy this machine prefer canon or whatever but never sony
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Azocar Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: low price. valuable
customer_reviews.text: it is replaced Sony W80. Image quality is better than W80. In Particular supersensitive picture(i.e. ISO800) is better than W80. And low price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro

customer_reviews.title: All good features
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality pictures and very easy to use. Also came in fast after ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: O. YOUNIS

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely good camera for the price it was sold. Picture Clarity is very good and have excellent features
customer_reviews.author: Sriswapna Chodagam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It was very easy to understand the instructions and I like the quality of the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel F. Gadea

customer_reviews.title: why did you send me two camera's
customer_reviews.text: you called and said my amazon charge had expired so I gave you my visa. i said i wanted it updated. the next day you called to ask if i wanted my charge updated for the camera i had asked about. ok. then i got two cameras. i had to pay 15.00 to return the second camera. i was very upset over this....
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Date/Time stamp?
customer_reviews.text: Can anyone tell me if this model has the date/time stamp fuction? I read that the newer Sony models don't have that option anymore (what a dumb decision from Sony!)...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony Cybershot DSCW120 7.2MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Capture smiles as they happen. The 7.2-megapixel Cyber-shot W120 features innovative Smile Shutter technology which photographs smiles as they happen. Built to impress, this model boasts a Carl Zeiss 4x optical zoom lens for high quality close-ups and Sony's Double Anti-Blur solution for crisp, clear images.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Capture smiles as they happen. The 7.2-megapixel Cyber-shot W120 features innovative Smile Shutter technology which photographs smiles as they happen. Built to impress, this model boasts a Carl Zeiss 4x optical zoom lens for high quality close-ups and Sony's Double Anti-Blur solution for crisp, clear images. For speedy recovery, the BIONZ image processor gets you ready for the next shot. In addition, it has Face Detection technology that detects up to eight faces and optimizes focus, exposure, and color for accurate, natural photos of family and friends. 

Cyber-shot W120 Highlights 

7.2-megapixel Super HAD CCD
More megapixels give you more detail and definition when you make big prints or crop in tight on your subject. The advanced Sony Super HAD (Hole Accumulated Diode) CCD design allows more light to pass to each pixel, increasing sensitivity and reducing noise. 

Carl Zeiss 4x Optical Zoom Lens
4x optical zoom brings distant subjects closer to help you capture sharp, detailed long shots and quickly frame images for better composition -- great for family sports, outdoor fun, and travel photos. 

2.5-inch TFT LCD Display
The large, bright 2.5-inch TFT LCD (115K) display makes it easy to compose shots, check results, and read menus in sharp natural color, even in bright sunlight. 

Face Detection
Face Detection technology automatically controls flash, focus, exposure, and white balance to help reveal faces in shadows, make skin tones look more natural, reduce red-eye, and eliminate harsh facial glare. Now with adult or child priority so you can determine who the focal point should be. 

Smile Shutter Mode
Smile Shutter technology captures smiles the moment they happen - without the need to press the shutter. The mode can be set to capture when your subject laughs, smiles or even grins, and like Face Detection is able to differentiate children and adults to set priority. 

Sony Double Anti-Blur Solution
The combination of Super SteadyShot optical image stabilization and high ISO sensitivity helps compensate for shaky hands, minimizes blur, and allow flash-free shooting to preserve the mood. 

Super SteadyShot Optical Image Stabilization
Compensates for shaky hands and minimizes blur with a built-in gyro sensor that detects camera movement and sends correcting signals to a stabilization lens -- so there’s no need to crop in on your shot to reduce blur. 

High Sensitivity (ISO 3200) Mode
With high sensitivity of ISO 3200, you can shoot effectively in low light without flash to preserve the mood, while the Sony Clear RAW Noise Reduction system helps suppress the color noise that can degrade low-light shots. 

Dynamic Range Optimization Standard
Powered by the exclusive Sony Bionz high-speed processing engine, Dynamic Range Optimization preserves image data in bright highlights and reveals more detail in shadows or backlit areas -- for great results even in difficult lighting conditions. 

Convenient Photo Modes
To adjust quickly for specific shooting situations, you can choose from several convenient photo modes, including Auto, Program Auto, and Scene Selections such as Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Fireworks, Smile Shutter, Landscape, Soft Snap, Snow, High Sensitivity, and Beach environments. 

MPEG Movie VX Fine Mode
Capture VGA (640 x 480) audio/video clips at a high frame rate (up to 30 frames per second). The maximum length of time you can shoot continuously is about 10 minutes. 

Automatic Macro Shooting
Standard Auto Focus now covers the macro focus range, eliminating the need to manually change focus modes for close-up photography. The Macro mode has not been eliminated, and enabling it accelerates Auto Focus when shooting at point-blank range. 

9-Point Auto Focus
Because an off-center subject can make your shot more interesting, a 9-point auto focus measures auto-focus at 9 precision points instead of 5 -- giving you greater creative freedom to compose your image. 

Smart Zoom Feature
The Sony Smart Zoom feature intelligently "crops into" the central portion of interest in your photo, helping avoid the image degradation of other digital zooms. 

Burst Mode
You can fire off up to one hundred shots at approx. 0.66 second intervals (at any resolution: VGA to full resolution mode) -- a great way to capture a child’s first steps or a pet’s best tricks.(Approx. 1.5fps (100 shots)). 

Simple Setup Controls
A quick press of the Home button opens your user-friendly graphical interface -- and you can select functions by simply moving a cursor vertically or horizontally to the appropriate icon. Function names and the on-screen Function Guide display make it easier to learn camera setup operations. 

Easy Shooting Mode
A simplified camera environment especially attractive to beginners or digital camera users who want to keep things simple, Easy Shooting provides easy-to-read, on-screen instructions and limits the number of camera settings to help prevent misuse of the camera while still providing excellent results. 

Function Guide
This beginner-friendly function helps manage various functions and settings by displaying the description of chosen functions or settings on the LCD screen. The Function Guide can also be switched off. 

Optical Viewfinder
In addition to the LCD display, a built-in optical viewfinder lets you compose your photos in traditional rangefinder camera style, and also helps save battery power by turning off your LCD display. 

15MB Internal Memory
Even if you forget your flash memory card, you can get the shot because 15MB internal memory lets you capture a limited number of shots with in-camera convenience, then easily transfer your shots to a PC or optional Memory Stick Duo media. 

Memory Stick Duo Media Convenience
A built-in slot accepts optional Memory Stick Duo Media or Memory Stick PRO Duo Media -- the compact, high-capacity storage media that make it easily to upload photos to your PC and are compatible with millions of devices worldwide. 

Stamina Battery Power
Provides extended battery life and shooting capacity when using a fully-charged Lithium Ion battery -- enough to cover a long weekend or a whole vacation. 

HDTV Compatibility
High-resolution images can be enjoyed in all their beauty simply by connecting the camera directly to a Sony BRAVIA HDTV or other compatible HDTV . This provides an excellent alternative to viewing photos as prints or on a computer monitor, and is ideal for users who want to share photos in the comfort of their living room. Optional HD solutions include a Cyber-shot cradle/charger with component cable output, or component cable directly to your HDTV. 

"PhotoTV HD"
PhotoTV HD compatibility allows the camera to be connected to a PhotoTV HD-capable Sony BRAVIA HDTV via the optional HD output adaptor, for highly detailed, high-definition color images displayed in unprecedented realism and full HD quality. 

16:9 High-Resolution Mode
In addition to the standard 2-megapixel size, the convenient 16:9 aspect ratio shooting mode for HDTV display can now be shot in 5 megapixels, making it possible to obtain beautiful, high-definition prints with the same aspect ratio as HDTV. 

Wide Zoom Display
To use the entire image area of the compatible HDTV screens, Wide Zoom automatically expands standard 4:3 and 3:2 images to 16:9. 

Photo Music
PHOTOMUSIC combines images with music to produce fun and entertaining slide shows with the following five visual effects (Simple, Basic, Nostalgic, Active and Stylish). Additionally, the number of music tracks stored in the camera memory has been doubled from four to eight, and music playback time has been extended from three to five minutes per track. More personalized slide shows are also possible by transferring music from a PC to the camera. 

Picture Motion Browser Software
Supplied software makes it easier to upload, organize, and search photos on your PC. When shooting photos using your camera and an optional GPS unit, the software even provides a convenient map view function that lets you sort photos by location and display their origin on a world map. 

BIONZ
Image processor delivers speed and precision. 

What's in the Box 

 * W120 digital camera 
 *  NP-BG1 rechargeable battery 
 * BC-CSG battery charger 
 * A/V and USB multi-connector cables 
 * Wrist strap 
 * Software CD-ROM 
 * Note: No Memory Stick Duo media or adaptors are included.
feature_bullets: 7.2-megapixel Super HAD CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 14 x 19-inch prints
Carl Zeiss 4x optical zoom lens; Dynamic Range Optimization
HDTV compatibility; HD slide show with music
15 MB internal memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/Pro Duo media

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
